name: elearning-platform
description: Production-ready E-Learning Platform (Udemy-like) with Design Patterns

scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && npm run wait-db && npm run setup:backend && concurrently --kill-others --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate:dev && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w backend
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
